name: Tribalcore Leader ep
description:
One Brick Down's first full length ep, "Tribalcore Leader" released in Jan 2009. Eleven tracks of straight up brutal metal w/ elements of latin percussion, and other exotic instruments. 

Upon its release, "Tribalcore Leader" has created a buzz in the NJ metal scene, as well as given a breath of fresh air to metal/hardcore genre, currently being played on Sirius/XM Liquid Metal and 89.5 WSOU.

For fans of Pantera, Sepultura, Unearth, Terror.
